basics.name: Mark Ryan Guamos
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: A Senior Software Engineer with 10+ years of professional experience, specializing in fullstack development, Java, SQL, and Javascript. A proven track record of managing large scale software engineering projects to support cloud deployments and integrations.

work.name: Amihan Solutions
highlights: Responsbile for application maintenance across the codebase.
Responsbile for adding new features in the application.

Participated on migrating on-premise applications to Azure.
